data.title: Hidden Gem in Long Beach GO!!!!
data.text: After a long walk around the downtown area, I actually stumbled on this pace by accident… Im so glad I did :) Pasty is tucked in a corner so you have to really look but when i waked in the smell of REAL British savory pies got me so hungry!!!! The owner was such a sweet lady, we talked for a few moments and I was then ready to order. I got the savory pie of ground beef, carrots, peas and potatoes . My pie actually came straight from the oven :) I think this place is fairly new, but it is really worth a try. Its on Pine if I remember and sit along with all the other restaurants and bars. If you want something different and authentic English, go!!!! When I get back to LB, it is a must stop for me :)

data.title: Delicia de postres.
data.text: Si quieres disfrutar de un buen postre y a precios bajos ese es el lugar perfecto.Tambien tiene bebidas calientes y frias para acompanar ,sus instalaciones son muy limpias y el servicio es muy bueno
